com.squareup.picasso

Class OkHttp3Downloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.picasso.OkHttp3Downloader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Downloader

    public final class OkHttp3Downloader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Downloader
    A Downloader which uses OkHttp to download images.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.squareup.picasso.Downloader

    • Constructor Detail

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(android.content.Context context)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into your application cache directory.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(java.io.File cacheDir)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into the specified directory.
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - The directory in which the cache should be stored

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(android.content.Context context,
                 long maxSize)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into your application cache directory.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - The size limit for the cache.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(java.io.File cacheDir,
                 long maxSize)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into the specified directory.
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - The directory in which the cache should be stored
        maxSize - The size limit for the cache.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(okhttp3.OkHttpClient client)
        Create a new downloader that uses the specified OkHttp instance. A response cache will not be automatically configured.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(okhttp3.Call.Factory client)
        Create a new downloader that uses the specified Call.Factory instance.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public Downloader.Response load(android.net.Uri uri,
                       int networkPolicy)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Downloader
        Download the specified image url from the internet.
        Specified by:
        load in interface Downloader
        Parameters:
        uri - Remote image URL.
        networkPolicy - The NetworkPolicy used for this request.
        Returns:
        Downloader.Response containing either a Bitmap representation of the request or an InputStream for the image data. null can be returned to indicate a problem loading the bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the requested URL cannot successfully be loaded.
